title: USGS Cascades Volcano Observatory Posts Annual Summary of Information Regarding Status of Uplift at Three Sisters Area of Central Oregon

und.value: Today, the USGS Cascades Volcano Observatory web site is posting a summary of current information regarding the Three Sisters area of central Oregon, which has been the site of slow uplift over a broad region since 1997.  Information will be posted at the bottom of the page in the Other Cascade Volcanoes section of the daily Cascade Range update at vulcan.wr.usgs.gov/Volcanoes/Cascades/CurrentActivity/current_updates.html.
